title: BIS Survey: 93% of the Worldâ€™s Central Banks Are Engaged in CBDC Work
description: The Bank for International Settlements (BIS), an organization that seeks to support the international cooperation of the world’s central banks, has released the results of its 2022 survey on central bank digital currencies (CBDC) and crypto. The survey found that 93% of the 86 banks surveyed were involved in CBDC-related work at different levels. BIS: […]

title: Binance Deactivating Token Trading, DigiToads Utility Functions Give This Meme Coin A Major Liquidity Boost
description: It has been a bad week for Binance. Several top executives, including the Chief Strategy Officer, announced they would be leaving the company. This follows recent events where the SEC forced Binance to remove several trading pairs and halt US deposits.
